channel.title: Photos on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in Photos on mattischrome

item.title: A new plant for the office
item.description: Ingrid bought me a new plant for my office. Beautiful flowers and cat friendly!

item.title: Spider webs in the garden
item.description: Ingrid bravely took this photo of our Christmas tree which is summering out in the garden and is currently decorated with spiders’ webs.

item.title: Bosham, July 2024
item.description: A nice shot of Bosham across the low tide while on a sunny walk with Ingrid’s cousin and family.

item.title: Cats lounging in the sun, July 2024
item.description: Our cats lounging in the warm spots one sunny morning.

item.title: Stonehenge, June 2024
item.description: What a beautiful day it was to be back at Stonehenge!

item.title: Stonehenge, June 2024
item.description: The ancient stones framed by cirrus clouds and beautiful blue skies.

item.title: Stonehenge, June 2024
item.description: View from the car on the way back home.

item.title: Paris, January 2024
item.description: Sat in the Jardins du Tulleries in Paris with a cup of coffee, feeling philosophical in the winter sunshine.

item.title: Paris, January 2024
item.description: The highlight of our trip was a visit to the Rodin Museum. This is the Burghers of Calais, a masterpiece that I’d not really paid much attention to before.
